attributes.action: Rename the section of road housing the Russian Embassy, "Free Ukraine"
attributes.additional_details: It provides a strong message inline with the UK's stance on Ukraine and will be a prominent point to staff and visitors to the Russian embassies in London
attributes.background: Rename the part of Bayswater Road that houses the Russian Embassy and Consulate to "Free Ukraine" and officially put the addresses of those buildings on that street (not Kensington Palace Gardens as it is now)

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about road names are a matter for the relevant local authority, not the UK Government or Parliament.
